author: CrackBerry Kevin
title: What type of phone will you be upgrading to the BlackBerry Mercury from? [Poll]
text:
So you're already thinking about getting a BlackBerry 'Mercury' when it becomes available. I want to know, what type of phone will you be upgrading from?

*/ /*-->*/ 
So you're already thinking about getting a BlackBerry 'Mercury' when it becomes available. I want to know, what type of phone will you be upgrading from? Be sure to cast your vote in the poll below and sound off in the comments!


What are you upgrading to the BlackBerry Mercury from? I don't think the purpose of this post can be any clearer. For those of you already sold on the BlackBerry Mercury or starting to lean towards getting one, I'm genuinely interested in knowing what you'll be switching to THE MERC from.
